group_1.textCenter: I know I already said this a minute ago, but I@can't talk about myself.
If you go around bein' too stubborn, you won't@make very many friends, y'hear?
But I suppose if you're stubborn about visiting@little old me...
I might eventually feel up to talkin' about it.
At any rate, you oughta get on home for today.@Won't be long before our clients start showin' up.
Well, feel free to drop on by another time!
